title: Jimmy Collins SGC 20 Piedmont 350 - $60 - writing on back
author: t206fix

posts.post_title: Jimmy Collins SGC 20 Piedmont 350 - $60 - writing on back
posts.post_content:
Jimmy Collins SGC 20 Piedmont 350

Appears much better - no creases - good corners - small wrinkle by his ear
but alas, there seems to be writing on the back....

a number 413 in the bottom right corner - must have been how many Piedmont cigarettes the original owner had to smoke before pulling this beauty:eek:

$60 delivered - paypal gift or add $$$
